title: Antiviral drugs
chapter: External causes of morbidity and mortality
block: Drugs, medicaments and biological substances causing adverse effects in therapeutic use
inclusion: correct drug properly administered in therapeutic or prophylactic dosage as the cause of any adverse effect
misadventures to patients during surgical and medical care
surgical and medical procedures as the cause of abnormal reaction of the patient, or of later complication, without mention of misadventure at the time of the procedure
exclusion: accidental overdose of drug or wrong drug given or taken in error
accidents in the technique of administration of drugs, medicaments and biological substances in medical and surgical procedures
